definitions.definition: the people or company that make something:
examples: They're the biggest maker of fast-food products in the UK
humorous He's gone to meet his Maker (= he has died).

definitions.definition: a person or machine that makes the stated thing:
someone who creates or invents things, either using traditional crafts or technology:
examples: There are spaces where makers can come and learn modern ways of manufacturing new products using devices like laser cutters and 3D printers.
